com.powerdata.openpa.pwrflow

Class ACBranchAdjacencies

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.powerdata.openpa.tools.LinkNet
      • com.powerdata.openpa.pwrflow.ACBranchAdjacencies

  • public class ACBranchAdjacencies
extends LinkNet
    Associate the network adjacency with PAModel / ACBranches. This is a specialized subclass of LinkNet that adds ACBranches from a list. Parallel branches are merged, and the merge operations are tracked in order to map both directions

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ACBranchAdjacencies.MatrixElementBuilder
      Provide a hook to build the matrix elements in the same processing loop as building the adjacencies
